name: Mariel Santos
purposes: calling to ask about the status of my application for the assistant role
transcript: Hi, this is Mariel Santos from the admin department. My email is marielsantos23mail.com. I’m calling to ask about the status of my application for the assistant role. I also have a question about the interview schedule. It’s actually kind of urgent — I need to confirm ASAP. Just following up since I haven’t heard anything back yet. Thank you so much!
